title.rendered: A Homeowner’s Guide to Delaware Solar Panel Installation

content.rendered:
A Homeowner’s Guide to Delaware Solar Panel Installation

Our Delaware Solar Panel Installation Guide was built to help explain everything you need to know about adding solar panels to your home. You’ll learn how to select the right DE solar installer, and get educated on how the solar installation process works, how much it might cost, what local and federal incentives are available, and what purchase options there are.

The 6 Steps to Solar in Delaware

Navigate through our streamlined guide designed to help you understand the essentials of solar energy in Delaware. From selecting a reputable local company to obtaining a free solar panel estimate, these six steps will guide you through every aspect of your solar journey.

6 Steps Quick Links

  1. Search For a Trusted Local Company
  2. Understand the Solar Installation Process
  3. Learn How Much DE Solar Panels Cost
  4. Apply for DE Solar Panel Tax Credits, Rebates, and Incentives
  5. Choose the Best Purchase Option For You
  6. Get a Free Solar Panel Estimate

Solar Energy Evolution in Delaware

Delaware, with its picturesque landscapes ranging from the serene Delaware River to its charming Atlantic beaches, is not just a state of scenic beauty but also a leader in the renewable energy movement. Embracing solar power, Delaware is forging a path towards an eco-friendly and sustainable future. The First State has initiated significant steps with policies like the Renewable Portfolio Standard (RPS), aiming for a substantial increase in renewable energy use by 2025, with solar energy playing a crucial role in this ambitious endeavor. Beyond policy measures, Delaware is distinguished by its solar rebate programs and tax incentives that facilitate solar adoption for its residents.

1. Search for a Trusted, Local DE Solar Panel Company

The finest solar installers are those that ensure transparency throughout the process. Solar Energy World stands as the premier Home Solar and Battery company in the region. We are the top provider and installer of solar panel systems in Delaware, and have been installing solar panels for over 15 years. We commit to guiding you through every step with our award-winning service, high-quality products, and certified technicians.

2. Understand How the Delaware Solar Panel Installation Process Works

1. Cost/Benefit Analysis

We begin by conducting a thorough cost-benefit analysis to help you understand the financial impact and savings that solar energy will bring to your home.

2. Site Assessment

A detailed site assessment follows, where our experts evaluate your property to determine the optimal setup for maximum solar efficiency.

3. Solar Rebates & Incentives

We navigate you through the various solar rebates and incentives available in Delaware, ensuring you get the best financial deal for your solar installation.

4. Professional Installation

Our team of certified professionals will then manage the installation of your solar panels, adhering to the highest standards of quality and safety.

5. System Inspection

After installation, we conduct a thorough system inspection to certify that everything is running smoothly and efficiently, and that your system meets all local regulations and standards.

6. Monitoring & Support

Finally, we provide ongoing monitoring and support to ensure your system continues to perform optimally. We stand by our service with a commitment to long-term customer satisfaction and support.

3. How Much Do Delaware Solar Panels Cost?

There are a variety of factors that will impact the total cost of your Delaware solar panel installation, but on average, DE homeowners spend between $12,500 and $17,000. DE solar rebates, tax credits, and other incentives can be used to help offset the cost by thousands. Typically, a DE solar panel system pays for itself between 6 to 10 years.

Recognizing the diverse financial situations of its residents, Delaware offers a variety of financing options for solar panel installations. While outright cash purchases are a common choice, yielding significant long-term savings, the state also supports those who may find the initial investment challenging. Delaware facilitates alternative financing solutions, including solar loans. These options enhance the accessibility of solar technology and promote wider adoption of renewable energy, accommodating the varied financial circumstances and preferences across the state.

Get more info on what impacts cost

4. Apply for DE Solar Panel Tax Credits, Rebates, and Incentives

As part of the Delaware Green Energy Program, three DE utility companies are offering solar rebates to make sure that you’re taking advantage of all applicable Delaware solar incentives, grants, and tax credits speak with consultant who is familiar with DE solar policies.

View all incentives

5. What Are the Available Purchase Options for DE Solar Panels?

At this time, Delaware only offers a purchase option with cash/credit/traditional financing; see below for the fantastic benefits of owning your system!

Features
Owning
Leasing
Pay $0 for Electricity
Make Money Off Excess Power Generated
Phenomenal ROI
Financing Available
Pay $0 for Equipment/Installation
Lower your Utility Bill by 20-30%
Start Saving Money Right Away

6. Get a Free Delaware Solar Panel Estimate

Requesting an estimate is 100% FREE and takes less than 5 minutes. Fill out the form or contact us!

"*" indicates required fields

Step 1 of 9

11%

Where is your property located?

We’re Sorry

The zip code or state of your property is not within our available service areas. We currently only serve customers with property located in PA, NJ, MD, DE, DC, VA or FL.

Do you own your property?

Select One
Owns Property*

We’re Sorry

Solar Energy World can only offer solar installation services to customers who own their property.

What type of property do you own?

Property Type*

Are you interested in leasing or purchasing your solar system?

Select one or more.
Interested In*

Would you like a battery backup with your installation?

Select One
Interested in Solar Battery Backup With Installation?*

How old is your roof?

Select an Option
Age of Roof

What day & time might work for your solar visit?

MM slash DD slash YYYY

How can we reach you?

*Your privacy is important to us. Your information will not be shared with outside parties. By clicking this button, you consent to be contacted by Solar Energy World, LLC.
* By clicking this button to submit this form, I am expressing written consent agreement to permit the company, Solar Energy World, and parties calling on their behalf, to contact me at the number provided below, even if it is currently listed on any state, federal, or corporate ‘Do Not Call’ lists. The phone number provided below will be used for marketing purposes including through the use of automated technology, SMS/MMS messages and AI communication forms. I acknowledge my consent is not required to obtain any good or service and to be connected with sellers that can fit my needs without providing consent I can call +1 (866) 856-4580.
This field is for validation purposes and should be left unchanged.
